text: @BorisJohnson FRO you incompetent lying selfserving opportunistic 🤡 your #HerdImmunity mismanagement of the #COVID19 outbreak is a disgrace as are you & your cabinet of the truly talentless willing to send people to their deaths due to lack of planning & the #tory underfunding of the #NHS
